scripts.build: pnpm i && pnpm load-env -- turbo run build
scripts.build:debug: pnpm i && pnpm load-env -- turbo run build:debug
scripts.clean: turbo run clean --no-cache --force && rm -rf .turbo && rm -rf sdk/.turbo && rm -rf frontend/.turbo && rm -rf frontend/.next
scripts.full-clean: pnpm run clean && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf sdk/node_modules && rm -rf frontend/node_modules
scripts.restart: pnpm run down && pnpm run up
scripts.test: pnpm run load-test-env -- turbo run test --no-cache --force
scripts.test:debug: pnpm run load-test-env -- dotenv -v FETCH_DEBUG=true -- pnpm run test
scripts.test:parallel: pnpm run load-test-env -- turbo run test:parallel --no-cache --force
scripts.test:sequential: pnpm run load-test-env -- turbo run test:sequential --no-cache --force
scripts.test:verbose: pnpm run load-test-env -- dotenv -v VERBOSE_TEST_LOGS=true -- pnpm run test --force
scripts.unit-test: pnpm run load-test-env -- turbo run unit-test
